message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great product that I believe you'll find valuable. I'm asking for $14,000. I think it's a fair price considering the benefits it will bring you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can't commit to $14,000. I'm willing to pay up to $12,000 for it. Looking forward to your response.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $12,000 is a bit too low for me. Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $13,000?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the adjustment, but I still can't go above $12,000 for this product. Could we possibly meet somewhere in the middle?
